docs.snippet: A chemical spill that tainted the tap water for 300,000 West Virginians two months ago continues to concern many people far outside the spill area who are confronting their own worries about Charleston's water as they visit this week for a state b...
docs.lead_paragraph: A chemical spill that tainted the tap water for 300,000 West Virginians two months ago continues to concern many people far outside the spill area who are confronting their own worries about Charleston's water as they visit this week for a state basketball tournament.

headline.main: After Spill, Some Visitors Worry About Tap Water
headline.print_headline: After Spill, Some Visitors Worry About Tap Water

docs.snippet: Some of the elders of the genre want to underscore its Bronx roots by opening a museum — to be called the Universal Hip Hop Museum — inside the Kingsbridge Armory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of the elders of the genre want to underscore its Bronx roots by opening a museum — to be called the Universal Hip Hop Museum — inside the Kingsbridge Armory.
docs.abstract: Universal Hip Hop Museum is being planned inside Kingsbridge Armory to underscore genre's Bronx roots; museum, conceived and being developed by some elders of hip hop scene, will use interactive technology to provide comprehensive look at the music, including its historical and cultural roots.

headline.main: Hip-Hop Pioneers Plan a Museum for the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Hip-Hop Pioneers Plan a Museum for the Bronx

docs.snippet: With medical statistics scarce, participants in hockey, long-distance running, boxing and even rodeo play till it hurts, and insist it helps keep them young....
docs.lead_paragraph: With medical statistics scarce, participants in hockey, long-distance running, boxing and even rodeo play till it hurts, and insist it helps keep them young.
docs.abstract: Older people who play extreme sports tend to do what feels right for them, even if it hurts sometimes, partially because medical statistics are scarce on this more adventurous niche of elder exercise.

headline.main: Older Athletes Punching Above Their Age
headline.print_headline: Older Athletes Punching Above Their Age
